title: API in PHP with Laravel
description: Bienvenue dans ce cours sur les API.

body.raw:
Create an API in PHP

Tutorial Basic
Before start, make sure you have [Composer](https://getcomposer.org/download/) install. ## Install Laravel ```sh composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel api-php ``` ### Basic API code in PHP Create an API `controller` with an articles resource: ```sh php artisan make:controller ArticleController ``` In `ArticleController.php` : ```php 1, 'title' => 'PHP API', 'content' => 'Introduction Ã  Laravel'] ]; public function index() { return response()->json($this->articles); } public function store(Request $request) { $newArticle = $request->all(); $this->articles[] = $newArticle; return response()->json($newArticle, 201); } } ``` In `api.php` : ```php Route::get('/articles', [ArticleController::class, 'index']); Route::post('/articles', [ArticleController::class, 'store']); ```
### API in NodeJs Build API with NodeJs ### API in PHP The marketing site with landing pages. ### API in Golang The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### API in Python The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX. ### API in TypeScript The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
